menu.desc_incidencias: Manage from here the impact of its clients
menu.desc_proyectos: Track your projects with this application
menu.desc_partes: In high all the work done by using parts of an hour
menu.desc_gastos: Control costs and know if they are liquidated
menu.desc_documentos: Please grouped all documentation of your company
menu.desc_agenda: Enter in the calendar all the visits and meetings
menu.desc_actas: Keep a record when make meetings more control
menu.desc_usuarios: The high, low or modify users
menu.desc_epigrafes: Define the entries for invoices and expenses
menu.desc_formaspago: Set payment methods to manage expenses
menu.desc_estados: Define the possible states of an event, project, etc...
menu.desc_seguimientos: Control tasks in a project with Tracking
menu.desc_correo: read and send mail from here to its customers and suppliers
menu.desc_cuentas: Define the accounting ledger accounts for
menu.desc_empleados: From high, low or modify employees
menu.desc_posiblescli: Control your potential customers can be
menu.desc_productos: Define here your products to sell
menu.desc_about: Meet the credits of this application
menu.desc_logout: Click here if you want to close your work session
menu.desc_home: Access the main screen of the application
menu.desc_textos: Create predefined texts for use in other applications
menu.desc_ficheros: Access to all files of the entire application
menu.desc_feeds: Track your RSS and Atom feeds from this application
menu.desc_importaciones: Import data for major applications from here
menu.desc_buscador: To search in all contents of the database
menu.desc_errorlog: To see the error logs of SaltOS
menu.menutip: To show and hide the application menu

datacfg.title_export: Export the entire database in SQL format
datacfg.desc_export: allows you to save a backup of the entire database
datacfg.desc2_export: Realize this operation periodically save this file in a safe place as a flash memory, a CD or any other external device to this computer
datacfg.title_import: Import the entire database in SQL format
datacfg.desc_import: can import all data from a backup
datacfg.desc2_import: Select the file to import by clicking [Browse] and then press the [Import] to upload the new data from the backup
datacfg.desc3_import: Important: The import deletes the current data you have in the application
datacfg.filenotfound: Unable to read the contents of import file
datacfg.filefoundok: It has imported correctly the backup
datacfg.fileimporterror: Error when trying to import the file
